Others: The T20 World Cup 2024 starts on 1 June with a match between co-hosts USA and Canada at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas but due to the time difference, the ICC mega event will kick off in India on 2 June (6 am IST).
The T20 World Cup 2024 will be the largest of all time with 20 teams in total including nine associate teams.
The final will be played in Bridgetown, Barbados.
The first match between USA and Canada will be played at 7.30 PM local time on 1 June which will be 6 AM on 2 June in India.
The final will start at 10 AM local time on 2 June which will be 7.30 PM in India on the same day.
